note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
body:
### Hello!

My name is Ricardo Vitorino, I'm from Coimbra (Portugal) and I am a _software developer_. Or so I try to be :)

This page will contain some details about me, especially how to contact me and some links where I write my thoughts.

(It will be more complete soon enough, don't worry!)
name: Ricardo Vitorino
